com.core.adnsdk

Class RoundedCornerImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • com.core.adnsdk.RoundedCornerImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class RoundedCornerImageView
extends android.widget.ImageView
    The rounded corner image view.

    Custom attributes of RoundedColorImageView defined as following: 

     <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <resources>
     <declare-styleable name="RoundedCornerImageView">
         <attr name="strokeWidth" format="dimension"/>
         <attr name="strokeColor" format="color"/>
         <attr name="solidColor" format="color"/>
         <attr name="radius" format="dimension" />
     </declare-styleable>
 </resources>
    User could customize RoundedColorImageView as following: 
     <com.core.adnsdk.RoundedCornerImageView
     ...
     strokeWidth="1dp"
     strokeColor="#FFFFFF"
     solidColor="#FFFFFF"
     radius="8dp" />
    Since:
    2016-03-02
